input type=range element

Chrome 143

Updated December 29, 2025

<div pseudo="-internal-datetime-container" style="unicode-bidi: normal;">
    <div pseudo="-webkit-datetime-edit" id="date-time-edit" datetimeformat="y-MM-dd" style="unicode-bidi: normal;">
        <div pseudo="-webkit-datetime-edit-fields-wrapper" style="unicode-bidi: normal;"><span role="spinbutton" aria-placeholder="yyyy" aria-valuemin="1" aria-valuemax="275760" aria-label="Year" pseudo="-webkit-datetime-edit-year-field">yyyy</span>
            <div pseudo="-webkit-datetime-edit-text" style="unicode-bidi: normal;">-</div><span role="spinbutton" aria-placeholder="mm" aria-valuemin="1" aria-valuemax="12" aria-label="Month" pseudo="-webkit-datetime-edit-month-field">mm</span>
            <div pseudo="-webkit-datetime-edit-text" style="unicode-bidi: normal;">-</div><span role="spinbutton" aria-placeholder="dd" aria-valuemin="1" aria-valuemax="31" aria-label="Day" pseudo="-webkit-datetime-edit-day-field">dd</span>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div pseudo="-webkit-calendar-picker-indicator" id="picker" tabindex="0" aria-haspopup="menu" role="button" title="Show date picker"></div>
</div>

Safari 26.2

Updated December 29, 2025

<div useragentpart="-webkit-datetime-edit">
    <div useragentpart="-webkit-datetime-edit-fields-wrapper">
        <div useragentpart="-webkit-datetime-edit-year-field" aria-label="year" role="spinbutton" aria-valuenow="0" aria-valuetext="0">2025</div>
        <div useragentpart="-webkit-datetime-edit-text">-</div>
        <div useragentpart="-webkit-datetime-edit-month-field" aria-label="month" role="spinbutton" aria-valuenow="0" aria-valuetext="0">12</div>

        <div useragentpart="-webkit-datetime-edit-day-field" aria-label="day" role="spinbutton" aria-valuenow="0" aria-valuetext="0">29</div>
    </div>
</div>

Firefox 146

Updated December 29, 2025

<div class="datetimebox" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" role="none">
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="chrome://global/content/bindings/datetimebox.css">
    <div class="datetime-input-box-wrapper" id="input-box-wrapper" role="presentation">
        <span class="datetime-input-edit-wrapper" id="edit-wrapper">
            <!-- Each of the date/time input types will append their input child
				- elements here -->
            <span class="datetime-edit-field numeric" aria-valuetext="" tabindex="0" data-l10n-id="datetime-year" value="" min="1" max="9999" pginterval="10" typebuffer="" mindigits="4" maxlength="4" role="spinbutton" aria-label="Year">yyyy</span><span>-</span><span class="datetime-edit-field numeric" aria-valuetext="" tabindex="0" data-l10n-id="datetime-month" value="" min="1" max="12" pginterval="3" typebuffer="" mindigits="2" maxlength="2" role="spinbutton" aria-label="Month">mm</span><span>-</span><span class="datetime-edit-field numeric" aria-valuetext="" tabindex="0" data-l10n-id="datetime-day" value="" min="1" max="31" pginterval="7" typebuffer="" mindigits="2" maxlength="2" role="spinbutton" aria-label="Day">dd</span></span>
        <button data-l10n-id="datetime-calendar" class="datetime-calendar-button" id="calendar-button" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Calendar">
            <svg role="none" class="datetime-calendar-button-svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="calendar-16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16">
                <path d="M13.5 2H13V1c0-.6-.4-1-1-1s-1 .4-1 1v1H5V1c0-.6-.4-1-1-1S3 .4 3 1v1h-.5C1.1 2 0 3.1 0 4.5v9C0 14.9 1.1 16 2.5 16h11c1.4 0 2.5-1.1 2.5-2.5v-9C16 3.1 14.9 2 13.5 2zm0 12.5h-11c-.6 0-1-.4-1-1V6h13v7.5c0 .6-.4 1-1 1z"></path>
            </svg>
        </button>
    </div>
</div>
